name: Ducks
description:
Collect ducks and jump off the waterfall with them for points. Don't wait too long to jump, other players can steal you ducks. When you fall off you will come back to collect more ducks.

Controls: Controllers or

Grey: move:wasd and boost:Shift

Pink: move:ijkl and boost:Space

Green: move:Arows and boost:Ctrl

Blue: move:Num8456 and boost:Num0

Start Game: Enter
